record.title: The Ghost in the Machine, or the Ghost in Organizational Theory? A Complementary View on the Use of Machine Learning.
record.subjects: Industrial organization (Economic theory) ; Machine learning ; Ontology ; Social facts ; Positivism
record.abstract: This article discusses the use of machine learning (ML) in organizational theory (OT) commenting on the 2021 article “Ghost in the machine: On organizational theory in the age of machine learning” by Leavitt et al. Here the authors focus on ontological neglect, the technological progress required to properly examine social phenomena, and the use of ML in OT under the lens of positivism.
